Desc.entry: A registered charity which is responsible for the study and protection of Victorian and Edwardian architecture and other arts. Local group campaigns to protect local buildings of architectural or historical interest. Winter programme of evening talks, open to non-members. Summer programme of visits in and around South Yorkshire and beyond.

ContactName.entry: Valerie Bayliss, Chair of South Yorkshire Group

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Various days and times, please contact for details
